channel.title: Docs on gotemplate
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on gotemplate

item.title: CLI Usage
item.description: usage: ./gotemplate [<flags>] <command> [<args> ...] An extended template processor for go. See: https://coveo.github.io/gotemplate for complete documentation. Flags: -h, --help Show context-sensitive help (also try --help-man). or set _GOTEMPLATE_HELP --color Force rendering of colors event if output is redirected or set _GOTEMPLATE_COLOR (alias: --c) -v, --version Get the current version of gotemplate --template-log-level=level Set the template logging level. Accepted values: disabled, panic, fatal, error, warning, info, debug, trace or set _GOTEMPLATE_TEMPLATE_LOG_LEVEL (alias: --tll) -L, --internal-log-level=level Set the internal logging level.
